list: An Idaho driver’s license or Idaho photo identification card.
A U.S. passport or Federal photo identification card.
A current student photo ID, issued by an Idaho high school or post secondary education institution.
A license to carry a concealed weapon issued by a county sheriff in Idaho.
notes: As outlined in Idaho Statute §34-1113, a registered voter must present a photo ID. (A voter without photo ID may sign a Personal Identification Affidavit instead.
